install.name: System - Piwik
install.author: Fredrik Åström
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 Fredrik Åström. All rights reserved.
install.description: This Plugin adds the Tracking Code for Piwik Analytics into your site.

field.name: piwik_site_id
field.label: Site ID
field.description: This is the Piwik Site ID. Check your Piwik settings to find out wich Site ID to use

field.name: piwik_http_url
field.label: Piwik HTTP URL
field.description: Insert the HTTP URL to your Piwik installation here. http://www.example.com/piwik/ IMPORTANT! Do NOT forget the trailing slash (/) in the URL

field.name: piwik_https_url
field.label: Piwik HTTPS URL
field.description: Insert the HTTPS URL to your Piwik installation here. https://www.example.com/piwik/ IMPORTANT! Do NOT forget the trailing slash (/) in the URL

param.name: piwik_site_id
param.label: Site ID
param.description: This is the Piwik Site ID. Check your Piwik settings to find out wich Site ID to use

param.name: piwik_http_url
param.label: Piwik HTTP URL
param.description: Leave it blank if you do not use piwik on another site. (Insert the HTTP URL to your Piwik installation here. http://www.example.com/piwik/ IMPORTANT! Do NOT forget the trailing slash (/) in the URL)

param.name: piwik_https_url
param.label: Piwik HTTPS URL
param.description: Leave it blank if you do not use piwik on another site. (Insert the HTTPS URL to your Piwik installation here. https://www.example.com/piwik/ IMPORTANT! Do NOT forget the trailing slash (/) in the URL)
